name: Carbeion
overview:
Carbeion offers a suite of software products for Enterprise GHG management to enable visibility of site & asset level carbon emissions, water & other such sustainability metrics to Fortune 500, mid-sized companies & public sector organizations.

Carbeion’s software has helped a number of companies in industries such as Manufacturing, Transportation & Logistics, Retail, Energy, Universities & Government to enable real-time carbon intelligence visibility across all stakeholders in an actionable format with the goal of achieving reductions by influencing behavior & optimizing business process.

Carbeion also offers a web-based solution to track, report and manage green procurement metrics & environmental impact metrics like scope 3 emissions within large & complex supply chains.

Carbeion’s cost effective hardware sensors & smart metering solutions integrate seamlessly into its software products providing much needed ease & simplicity of data acquisition
